p: Recently, the expression pattern of ACE2 in adult human testis at the level of single-cell transcriptomes was shown to be predominantly enriched in spermatogonia, Leydig, and Sertoli cells ( 27). In the clinical setting, ANG 1â€“7 and Mas were detected in the seminiferous tubules, as well as in the interstitial compartment, mainly Leydig cells, in men with normal spermatogenesis. However, neither components of the RAAS were found in the seminiferous tubules of infertile men with nonobstructive azoospermia ( 20).
